actionCalls.description: This apex action is used to compare the list of users that are reporting to the logged in user and the list of tasks that are assigned to the logged in user by the list of users reporting to the the logged in users. In this case we need the list of users that didn't submit their list of focus clients for approval.
actionCalls.name: actgetCommonandUniqueRecords
actionCalls.label: actgetCommonandUniqueRecords

assignments.description: This assignment will add the names of the users that are already approved for this year to the variable
assignments.name: assApprovedUsers
assignments.label: assApprovedUsers

assignments.description: This element will approve the focus clients for all clients from that specific user.
assignments.name: assApproveFocusClients
assignments.label: assApproveFocusClients

assignments.description: This assignment makes all collections for the icons, labels and descriptions empty, so the buttons will not been shown multiple times when the flow keeps running.
assignments.name: assEmptyCollectionsforQuickChouice
assignments.label: assEmptyCollectionsforQuickChouice

assignments.description: This element will assign the focusclient prio to the selected records
assignments.name: assFocusClient_0
assignments.label: assFocusClient

assignments.description: This element will remove the focus client to the selected records
assignments.name: assFocusClientNextYear
assignments.label: assFocusClientNextYear

assignments.description: This assignment will add the names of the users that haven't submitted their focus clients for approval (so the ones that didn't finish the flow and created an automatic task).
assignments.name: assUsers
assignments.label: assUserswithoutApprovalTask

decisions.description: This element will check if any open accountplanning tasks are found. So we can use the one that has created this task to show in the selection list and we can show the others that didn't finish their task in another list.
decisions.name: dcsAccountplanningTasksFound
decisions.label: dcsAccountplanningTasksFound

decisions.description: This element checks which button is pressed: Set or Remove as Focus Client
decisions.name: dcsButtonPressed
decisions.label: dcsButtonPressed

decisions.description: This element will check if there are any focus clients found for the logged in user.
decisions.name: dcsFocusClients
decisions.label: dcsFocusClients

decisions.description: This element will check if there are any focus clients for next year are found for the logged in user.
decisions.name: dcsFocusClientsNextYear
decisions.label: dcsFocusClientsNextYear

decisions.description: This element checks if the user clicked on the button Yes or No.
decisions.name: dcsWarning
decisions.label: dcsButtonWarning

Flow.description: This screen flow will guide the director through the process of approving the selected prio customers of commercial manager

dynamicChoiceSets.description: This record choice will show all users where the manager is equal to the logged in user.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: rcsMyTeam

dynamicChoiceSets.description: This record choice set is based on the tasks with type: Accountplanning and the checkbox Accountplanning activated.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: rcsSubmittedUsers

formulas.name: fmQueryApprovedNextYearFocusClients
formulas.expression: "SELECT Id, AccountNameForm__c, Name, StatusPick__c, FocusClientNextYearPick__c FROM BusinessUnitSpecificAttribute__c WHERE BusinessUnitOwnerRef__r.Name = '" + {!plUser} + "' AND FocusClientApproved__c = 'Approved' AND FocusClientPick__c = '" + {!qcSelection.value} + "'"

formulas.name: fmQueryCurrentFocusClients
formulas.expression: "SELECT Id, AccountNameForm__c, Name, StatusPick__c, FocusClientPick__c FROM BusinessUnitSpecificAttribute__c WHERE BusinessUnitOwnerRef__r.Name = '" + {!plUser} + "' AND FocusClientPick__c = '" + {!qcSelection.value} + "'"

formulas.name: fmQueryNextYearFocusClients
formulas.expression: "SELECT Id, AccountNameForm__c, Name, StatusPick__c, FocusClientNextYearPick__c FROM BusinessUnitSpecificAttribute__c WHERE BusinessUnitOwnerRef__r.Name = '" + {!plUser} + "' AND FocusClientNextYearPick__c = '" + {!qcSelection.value} + "'"

formulas.name: fmTableTitleFocusClientsCurrentYear
formulas.expression: IF ({!fmUserLanguageCode} = 'nl_NL', {!plUser} + " - " + {!qcSelection.value} + " focus klanten voor " + {!fmThisYearText}, {!plUser} + " - " + {!qcSelection.value} + " focus clients for " + {!fmThisYearText})

formulas.name: fmTableTitleFocusClientsNextYear
formulas.expression: IF ({!fmUserLanguageCode} = 'nl_NL', {!plUser} + " - " + {!qcSelection.value} + " focus klanten voor " + {!fmNextYear}, {!plUser} + " - " + {!qcSelection.value} + " focus clients for " + {!fmNextYear})

formulas.name: fmTaskMessage
formulas.expression: "Beste " + {!$User.ManagerFullName__c} + "," + br() + br() + "Mijn lijst met focus klanten voor " + {!fmNextYear} + "staat klaar voor accordering. Kun je deze s.v.p beoordelen?"

formulas.description: Extracts this user language code from the current user.
formulas.name: fmUserLanguageCode

Flow.interviewLabel: Business Unit - SCFL02 - Approve Focus Clients {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Business Unit - SCFL02 - Approve Focus Clients

loops.description: This element will loop through the selected Focus rows.
loops.name: lpAllFocusNextYear
loops.label: lpAllFocusNextYear

loops.description: This element will loop through the list of approved focus client list (tasks) by the logged in user within this year.
loops.name: lpApprovedTasks
loops.label: lpApprovedTasks

loops.description: This element will loop through the selected Focus rows.
loops.name: lpSelectedNoFocusNextYearRows
loops.label: lpSelectedNoFocusNextYearRows

loops.description: This element will loop through the selected Focus rows.
loops.name: lpSelectedNoFocusRows
loops.label: lpSelectedNoFocusRows

recordLookups.description: This element will retrieve all open accountplanning task for the logged in manager
recordLookups.name: getAccountplanningTasks
recordLookups.label: getAccountplanningTasks

recordLookups.description: This element will retrieve the renewed focus clients of all commercial manager for next year
recordLookups.name: getAllFocusClientsNextYear
recordLookups.label: getAllFocusClientsNextYear

recordLookups.description: This element will retrieve the approval task from the selected user, so in the next step it can be marked as approved. In the next step we don't add a decision element, because there is an approval task available (otherwise we couldn't get so far in the flow).
recordLookups.name: getApprovalTask
recordLookups.label: getApprovalTask

recordLookups.description: This element will retrieve all closed accountplanning task for the logged in manager this year
recordLookups.name: getApprovedAccountplanningTasksThisYear
recordLookups.label: getApprovedAccountplanningTasksThisYear

recordLookups.description: This element will retrieve the current focus clients of a commercial manager for next year
recordLookups.name: getFocusClientsNextYear
recordLookups.label: getFocusClientsNextYear

recordLookups.description: This element will retrieve the current focus clients of a commercial manager for this year
recordLookups.name: getMyTeamFocusClientsCurrentYear
recordLookups.label: getMyTeamFocusClientsCurrentYear

recordLookups.description: This element will retrieve the selected business unit specific attribute based on the user's business unit and the selected account.
recordLookups.name: getSelectedBusinessUnit
recordLookups.label: getSelectedBusinessUnit

recordLookups.description: This element will retrieve more info from the selected user. In this case we need the business unit of the selected user. It could be possible that the manager is replacing another manager so it is not reliable to use the business unit from the manager.
recordLookups.name: getSelectedUser
recordLookups.label: getSelectedUser

recordLookups.description: This element will retrieve more info from the selected user. In this case we need the business unit of the selected user. It could be possible that the manager is replacing another manager so it is not reliable to use the business unit from the manager.
recordLookups.name: getSelectedUser2
recordLookups.label: getSelectedUser

recordUpdates.description: This element will set the task to Completed.
recordUpdates.name: ruApprovalTask
recordUpdates.label: ruApprovalTask

recordUpdates.description: This element will update the selected records from the table with the values from the assignment.
recordUpdates.name: ruBusinessUnitSpecificAttributes
recordUpdates.label: ruBusinessUnitSpecificAttributes

recordUpdates.description: This element will update the field Focus Client Next Year with the selected prio.
recordUpdates.name: ruBusinessUnitSpecificAttributesFocus
recordUpdates.label: ruBusinessUnitSpecificAttributesFocus

fields.name: dtDescription4
fields.fieldText: There are no approvals waiting for you.

fields.name: dtTitle
fields.fieldText: Approval Focus Client Wizard

fields.name: dtDescription
fields.fieldText:
Welcome to the focus client wizard. With this tool you can approve the focus clients for next year ({!fmNextYear}) for your team.


Please select one of the buttons to start the prioritizing of existing or new clients.

fields.name: dtOverviewApprovalperUser
fields.fieldText:
❌ Not submitted:

{!varUserswithoutApprovalTask}

✔️ Approved:

{!varUserswithApprovedTask}

value.stringValue: [{"apiName":"AccountNameForm__c","guid":"column-9dde","editable":false,"hasCustomHeaderLabel":true,"customHeaderLabel":"Account","wrapText":true,"order":0,"label":"Account Name","type":"customRichText"},{"apiName":"Name","guid":"column-ba29","editable":false,"hasCustomHeaderLabel":true,"customHeaderLabel":"Business Unit","wrapText":true,"order":1,"label":"Business Unit Specific Attribute Name","type":"text"},{"apiName":"StatusPick__c","guid":"column-2fac","editable":false,"hasCustomHeaderLabel":false,"customHeaderLabel":"","wrapText":true,"order":2,"label":"Status","type":"text"},{"apiName":"FocusClientNextYearPick__c","guid":"column-e62f","editable":false,"hasCustomHeaderLabel":false,"customHeaderLabel":"","wrapText":true,"order":3,"label":"Focus Client Next Year","type":"text"}]

fields.name: dtApproved
fields.fieldText: ✅ The list of Focus Clients for {!plUser} over {!fmNextYear} is already approved

fields.name: dtTitleAddAccount
fields.fieldText: ﻿Add New Focus Client for {!fmNextYear}

fields.name: dtDescription3
fields.fieldText: The focus list for {!plUser} is Approved.

fields.name: dtDescription2
fields.fieldText: Is the focus list for {!plUser} ready for {!fmNextYear}, in other words can we approve the list?

variables.description: This variable is assigned with the names (via the assignment "assFocusClient") of all the users that haven't send their list of focus clients for approval.
variables.name: varUserswithoutApprovalTask
